column1: Visitation will be held on Friday
column3: 2015 from 6:00 to 9:00 pm. Funeral Service will be held on Saturday
column5: 2015 at 2:00 p.m. at Deberry Baptist Church with Rev. Jimmy Bedingfield and Rev. Jeremy Cox officiating. Interment will follow at Deberry Baptist Church Cemetery. Sims Funeral Home was in charge of the arrangements.
